item.title: Leaderboard
item.description: Rank Name Part I Part II Part III Total Points — Nobody’s here! You could be the first… — — — — InfoParticipate to earn GAME DEV POINTS, which will award you with a surprise during the Game Jam! Each participation will be worth 200 points, with winners of the special challenges earning an extra 100 points per challenge.
